{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = A Note on the Forge
| icon           = poe2 armor_invoice icon.png
| description    = Let this serve as a general reminder that the flame nāga are ''sensitive to disruption.'' If you must venture downstairs, try and give Forgemaster Tythus a wide berth while she’s at work. Many of her staff have not enjoyed favorable encounters with kith in the past and use the forge as a kind of creative outlet, so let's all do our part to keep them comfortable, hm?

Acolyte Kinnuq
